Uses of Class
xxl.core.io.fat.FATDevice

  • Packages that use FATDevice 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.io.fat
    This part is an implementation of the FAT12/16/32-filesystem based on raw access.

    • Uses of FATDevice in xxl.core.io.fat

      protected FATDevice BPB.device
      Instance of FATDevice.
      protected FATDevice FATFilesystemOperations.fd
